name: STRGZR
description:
Welcome to STRGZR

An early demo in PICO-8 for a possible larger project. Navigate your ship through the minefield back to your home base in this early level!

Left/Right to move

(X) to shoot

(Z) to use your Warp Dash

Replenish your Warp Dash fuel by picking up the red containers which occasionally spawn. You can't shoot while in your Warp Dash but you can bulldoze through enemies without dying or scoring points. Decide whether you want to go for the high score or the fastest time!
